physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the Merchant Street in Rangoon
 Burma. There is a wide road in the middle of the photograph
 with a couple of carriages on it. On either side of the road there is a row of buildings. There is a clock tower in the distance. On the right of the photograph
 there is a view of the top of a pagoda. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Merchant Street, Rangoon
metadata.materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Merchant Street in Rangoon, Burma. There is a wide road in the middle of the photograph, with a couple of carriages on it. On either side of the road there is a row of buildings. There is a clock tower in the distance. On the right of the photograph, there is a view of the top of a pagoda. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
